Posted By: RedAtrocitus (8/21/2012 6:35:00 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This set sometimes seems like wizards asked all the designer's to be nostalgic and some of them also had alzheimer's.  
  
"Hey guys. Remember [Serra Avatar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Serra Avatar)?"  
  
"Aw yeah that was a sweet card. Hey, remember Phyrexian Hulk?"  
  
"Um... We just reprinted that like a year ago..."  
  
"We did not! Put it on the list! And make it uncommon, I don't think the meta-game is ready for a 5/4 6cmc vanilla artifact creature at common yet. "
posts.html:

Rating:

posts.post_content:
What does [Wurmcoil Engine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wurmcoil Engine) have over this? Only +1/+2, deathtouch, lifelink, Wurmcoil splits in half when it dies... oh, and it costs the same amount of mana.  
  
Yeah. That should clue you into how terrible this card is. Yes, Wurmcoil is a mythic, but this is an uncommon. It shouldn't be *that* much worse...

posts.post_content:
Advantages compared to Obsi\*\*\* Golem (vanilla 4/6):  
  
1 extra power  
Goes in Phyrexian decks  
Dies to [Zzzyxas's Abyss](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zzzyxas's Abyss) later  
Currently in print  
  
Disadvantages compared to Obsi\*\*\* Golem:  
  
2 less toughness  
Obi\*\*\* Golem is censored  
Less funny flavor text  
Alpha printings are always worth more  
  
Things that are the same as Obsi\*\*\* Golem:  
  
Artifact Creature — Golem  
Uncommon in most sets  
Mostly a core set card  
2-word name
